citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility is providing enrichment and the regulated birds present live in a socialized setting, however a written plan for
environmental enhancement that is approved by the attending veterinarian is not available. A written plan helps ensure
that birds are provided with species-appropriate enrichment and socialization. Ensure that a written environmental
enhancement plan that is approved by the attending veterinarian is maintained.
***Correct by June 30, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
